```{r with silent}

descr(iris) %>% print() %>% knit_print()
descr(
  iris,
  "Species",
  group_labels = list(setosa = "My custom group label"),
  var_options = list(Sepal.Length = list(label = "My custom variable label"))
) %>% print() %>%  knit_print()
```

